    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board​(GameMap map,
             java.util.Map<AmmoColor,​java.util.List<Weapon>> weapons)
        Constructor: creates a new board based on its map, its killshot track and weapons positioned near its spawnpoint
        Parameters:
        map - the map of the board
        weapons - a collection of three boards placed next to the spawpoints defined by a color and that contain three weapons each

    • Method Detail

      • setSkulls

        public void setSkulls​(int skulls)
        Sets the number of skulls of the game.
        Parameters:
        skulls - it's the number of skulls that the game will have.

      • pickWeapon

        public void pickWeapon​(Weapon chosenWeapon)
        Method that removes a weapon card from the board
        Parameters:
        chosenWeapon - weapon chosen by the player between the ones next to the spawnpoint he is in

      • refillWeapons

        public void refillWeapons​(DecksHandler decksHandler)
        Method that places a weapon dealt randomly on the board if a weapon card is missing
        Parameters:
        decksHandler - class that takes care of the draw of the card

      • showWeapons

        public java.util.List<Weapon> showWeapons​(AmmoColor color)
        Method that shows the three weapons placed next to a certain spawn point
        Parameters:
        color - the color of the spawn point next to the weapons that have to be shawn, defined as a AmmoColor Enum type
        Returns:
        a list containing the weapons in the spawn point of the color provided

      • skullsLeft

        public int skullsLeft()
        Method that shows the skulls left that represent the deaths that have to occur for the game to end
        Returns:
        the number of skulls left

      • addBloodFrom

        public void addBloodFrom​(PlayerColor player,
                         java.lang.Integer count)
        Method that adds a certain number (either 1 or 2) of damage tokens of a certain color to the killshot track
        Parameters:
        player - the color of the player that caused the death
        count - the number of damage tokens to add (either 1 or 2)

      • isFinalFrenzy

        public boolean isFinalFrenzy()
        Return true if the game is in final frenzy mode

      • getBlood

        public java.util.List<PlayerColor> getBlood​(int i)
        Method that shows the number of damage tokens and their color for a given death round
        Parameters:
        i - an index that represents the death rounds starting from zero
        Returns:
        a collection of damage tokens, all having the same color defined as a PlayerColor Enum type

      • getMap

        public GameMap getMap()
        Board's map getter
        Returns:
        the map of the board

      • assignBlood

        public void assignBlood()
        This method assigns the points of the skull track at the end of the game

      • toStringFromPlayer

        public java.lang.String toStringFromPlayer​(Player player)
        Saves the situation of the board in a string
        Parameters:
        player - it's the player that is playing right now
        Returns:
        the String with the game situation
